extracted_text:
# ACCIDENT STATEMENT FORM

## Policyholder Information

Name: John Peterson
Address: 1142 Pinecrest Avenue, Springfield, OH 45503
Phone: (937) 555-2319
Email: john.peterson@email.com
Policy Number: LIAB-AUTO-001
Claimant ID:

## Vehicle Information

Year/Make/Model: 2004 Honda Accord
Color: Silver
VIN: 1HGCH56404A123456
License Plate: OH-GHR1984

## Accident Information

Date of Incident: July 17, 2025
Time: 8:30 AM
Location: Parking Lot, 2325 Main Street, Springfield, OH 45503

## Description of Incident

On the morning of July 17, 2025, my vehicle was legally parked in a market parking space at 2325 Main Street, Springfield. At approximately 8:30 AM, while I was inside a nearby store, I was notified by a witness that a gray pickup truck attempting to park beside my car, struck the front end and driver's side of my vehicle. The other car's driver failed to properly judge the distance and collided with my vehicle, causing significant damage. The other driver left their information and waited for the police to arrive.

accident_information.location: Parking Lot, 2325 Main Street, Springfield, OH 45503

description_of_incident.description: On the morning of July 17, 2025, my vehicle was legally parked in a market parking space at 2325 Main Street, Springfield. At approximately 8:30 AM, while I was inside a nearby store, I was notified by a witness that a gray pickup truck attempting to park beside my car, struck the front end and driver's side of my vehicle. The other car's driver failed to properly judge the distance and collided with my vehicle, causing significant damage. The other driver left their information and waited for the police to arrive.

notes: No claimant ID, witness name or contact, police report number, or signature present. Damage details not specified.

matched_policy.title: Liability Only Auto Insurance Policy
matched_policy.summary: This policy provides liability coverage for damages and injuries you cause to others but does not cover damage to your own vehicle or injuries to yourself. It includes bodily injury and property damage liability with state minimum limits.

coverage_assessment.relevant_policy_sections: Section 1 Coverage Overview and Section 4 What's NOT Covered specify that damage to the policyholder's own vehicle is not covered under this liability-only policy.

liability_assessment.key_factors: The policyholder's vehicle was legally parked and stationary; the third party driver misjudged distance and struck the policyholder's vehicle, causing damage. The third party admitted fault and waited for police.

claim_validity.primary_reasons: The claim is valid as the third party is at fault and the incident is well described with witness confirmation and third party cooperation. However, the policyholder's own policy does not cover vehicle damage.

policy_evaluation.notes: The policyholder holds a liability-only policy which excludes coverage for damage to their own vehicle. The third party is liable for the damage, so the policyholder should pursue a claim against the third party's insurance. Lack of police report and witness contact details may complicate third party claim but does not invalidate the claim itself.
